title: Fate and biological uptake of polystyrene nanoparticles in freshwater wetland ecosystems
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Franca Stábile, Mikael T Ekvall, Julián A. Gallego-Urrea, Temitope Nwachukwu, W. G. Chalani U. Soorasena , Pierina I. Rivas-Comerlati , Lars-Anders Hansson
Little is known about the fate and uptake of nanoplastics (NPs) in natural ecosystems, mainly due to analytical limitations in measuring NPs in complex environmental matrices. Our aim was to...
